# `usage help`

- **Usage**: `usage help <SUBCOMMAND>`
- **Source code**: [`cli/src/cli/help.rs`](https://github.com/jdx/usage/blob/main/cli/src/cli/help.rs)

Print this message or the help of the given subcommand(s)
